Package parallel_arrays

Class ArraySum

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinTask<V>
java.util.concurrent.RecursiveTask<Long>
parallel_arrays.ArraySum
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Future<Long>
public class ArraySum extends RecursiveTask<Long>
The ArraySum class extends RecursiveTask to compute the sum of an array segment. This class uses a fork/join framework to provide thread-level parallelism.
Version:
1.0
